highlights: Support, administer, and maintain cloud-based Supply Chain Modeling platform running on a mix of home-grown KOPS and EKS-based k8s clusters, and Windows EC2 instances
Run production deployments in collaboration with engineering and QA teams
Create and maintain platform automation code, including chef recipes, ansible scripts, custom terraform modules, python scripts, docker files, powershell scripts, and helm charts
Collaborate with devs to implement new features by identifying and provisioning new infrastructure as necessary
Maintain CI/CD infrastructure and tooling, including Jenkins, Windows and Linux Jenkins agents, custom Groovy Library and Artifactory
Manage a backlog of customer support requests ranging from diagnosing complex technical issues to recommending CI/CD best practices
Support customers during critical system down incidents by providing accurate, timely problem diagnose and clear resolution steps
Re-create product issues and collaborate with engineering to deliver bug fixes
Contribute to product through creation of knowledge base articles, documentation fixes, and reporting software bugs
Verification and scale testing of KVM and virtualization solutions on system Z for various linux distros
Find software bugs and determine root-cause, follow-through with development team to ensure bug resolution
As technical lead, facilitate stand-ups and retrospectives, collaborate on testcase design and prioritization, remove blockers
Drive adoption of modern infrastructure automation tools through education, workshops, and by supporting team members
Collaborate with IBM KVM development team to plan and prioritize for upcoming test cycle
Participated in the entire SDLC, from discovery to deployment and maintenance, of two OS-level components
Led adoption of a modern CI pipeline resulting in improved code quality and a streamlined developer experience
As iteration manager, facilitated daily stand-ups, user story sessions, design discussions, and retrospectives
